channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 03:22 Drive alarm to Cherkasy region.Creat by further messages.
item.description: 游릭 03:22 Drive alarm to Cherkasy region.Creat by further messages.#Cherkasy This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
